content:
# The recipe for stone bricks indicates that it requires 2 stones to produce 1 stone brick. Since I currently have 8 stones, I can craft additional stone bricks if needed. However, the recipe is marked as disabled, meaning I cannot craft more stone bricks at this time.

# Next, I should explore other recipes that I can create using my current inventory, particularly focusing on iron ore and stone bricks. 

# I will check the available recipes for iron ore and see what I can produce with it.
iron_ore_recipes = get_prototype_recipe(Prototype.IronOre)
print(iron_ore_recipes)  # Display the details of the iron ore recipes.
